thread.title: What heartbreak? Kylie Minogue beams in sun-drenched photo days after breaking her silence on Joshua Sasse split
thread.title_full: What heartbreak? Kylie Minogue beams in sun-drenched photo days after breaking her silence on Joshua Sasse split

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: What heartbreak? Kylie Minogue beams in sun-drenched photo days after breaking her silence on Joshua Sasse split
text:
Kylie's smiling again (Photo: Instagram)     
Kylie Minogue appears to be putting her heartbreak well and truly behind her. 
The pop star was all smiles on Monday as she watched the sun set behind the ocean from a picture perfect beach. 
Sporting a huge grin, Kylie is looking off into the distance while sat cross legged in the white sand. 
The uplifting post comes days after she addressed splitting from Joshua Sasse for the first time. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQuwbnxF9v2/?taken-by=kylieminogue/embed 
The singer announced just two weeks ago that the couple had made the decision to break off their engagement, but she has refused to be put down by the heartbreaking news - instead, she's focusing on moving forwads. 
"It wasn't meant to be and so I look forward to moving on, richer for the experience," she told the Sunday Herald Sun as she chose to remain positive. The couple confirmed their breakup earlier this month (Photo: FameFlynet.uk.com) 
Despite Kylie still not finding Mr. Right as of yet, she doesn't think she's been unlucky in love. 
"I haven't had the white picket fence and happy ever after in my life, so far, but perhaps that' just not my destiny. I know love and I love to be in love," she added. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
